page.title: 10Village Policeman
page.content: The village of Chew Stoke and Nempnett Thrubwell form a small part of the{Bath Division.}I am supervised by Officer's from my local headquarters at{Keynsham.} I share the responsibility for policing the 8 villages which form my beat, with another locally based constable. We both live in detached houses which have a part of the building set aside as Police Stations. I am supplied with a 7 cwt van which is fitted with both VHF and UHF radios. For my personnel protection, I am issued with a flame proof uniform and reinforced helmet, a short wooden truncheon and set of handcuffs. My role as Community Policeman requires me to be 1 of the community, while still being responsible for maintaining law and order. {Ian Spedding. }(Chew Stoke)
